attributes.action: The FA to refund all England fans for the EURO2016 campaign & qualifiers
attributes.additional_details: For those that signed up to the supporters club, those that spent their hard earned money traveling to Wembley and watching at times some awful football by England, living in the hope that maybe, just maybe, the Three Lions would roar in France, to suffer yet more genuine heartache whilst the players retreat to their millionaire lifestyle, its time to pay the fans back.
attributes.background: After the poor and awful football shown by the England national team and their disgraceful exit from EURO 2016 the multi-millionaire players should be made to refund the hardworking England fan who spent a lot of time and money following them since 2014 for the EURO 2016 tournament
